name: multilaterally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves more than two groups or countries: We have been engaged multilaterally with a number of countries to deal with this issue. The need for rules that are agreed multilaterally has never been stronger. See
multilateralCompare
bilaterally
unilaterally
More examplesFewer examplesYou seem to be saying that you're going to operate multilaterally.I think the best route will be to continue to work multilaterally.These solutions should be multilaterally agreed in the proper forum.
